title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4801.1 - Notification to commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4801.1 - Notification to commission

State Regulations

Where the governing body of a municipality delegates to
an officer or officers the responsibility and authority granted to it pursuant
to the Bingo Licensing Law, the governing body shall give the commission notice
of the following on form BC-110 as prescribed by the commission: the name or
names of the officer or officers and their successor and successors, the
effective date of the appointment or appointments, the duration of the
appointment or appointments, immediate notice if the designation or
designations are revoked or modified, the nature of the responsibility and
authority delegated in detail and any subsequent modification or revocation of
such responsibility and authority, and such other information as may be
required by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4801.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
